name: 3ddelay
author: AFNI Developers
description: Estimates the time delay between each voxel time series in a 3D+time dataset and a reference time series.

inputs.description: Filename of the input 3D+time dataset
inputs.name: Input file

inputs.description: Input ideal time series file name
inputs.name: Reference file

inputs.description: Sampling frequency in Hz. of data time series (1/TR)
inputs.name: Sampling frequency

inputs.description: Stimulus period in seconds. Set to 0 if stimulus is not periodic
inputs.name: Stimulus period

inputs.description: The prefix for the results Brick
inputs.name: Prefix

inputs.description: Detrend input time series with polynomial of specified order. Default is -1 for auto selection
inputs.name: Polynomial order

inputs.description: Remove only the mean (equivalent to polort 0)
inputs.name: No detrending

inputs.description: Units for delay estimates in seconds
inputs.name: Units in seconds

inputs.description: Units for delay estimates in degrees. Requires Tstim > 0
inputs.name: Units in degrees

inputs.description: Units for delay estimates in radians. Requires Tstim > 0
inputs.name: Units in radians

inputs.description: Wrap delay (or phase) values
inputs.name: Phase wrap

inputs.description: Do not wrap phase (default)
inputs.name: No phase wrap

inputs.description: Reverse phase such that phase -> (T-phase)
inputs.name: Phase reverse

inputs.description: Scale phase: phase -> phase*SC (default no scaling)
inputs.name: Phase scale

inputs.description: Do not correct for the bias in the estimates
inputs.name: Bias correction disabled

inputs.description: Correct for the bias in the estimates (default)
inputs.name: Bias correction enabled

inputs.description: Correct for slice timing differences (default)
inputs.name: Slice timing correction enabled

inputs.description: Do not correct for slice timing differences
inputs.name: Slice timing correction disabled

inputs.description: Filename of mask dataset. Only voxels with non-zero values in the mask will be considered
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Number of first dataset image to use in the delay estimate
inputs.name: First image

inputs.description: Number of last dataset image to use in the delay estimate
inputs.name: Last image

inputs.description: Cross Correlation Coefficient threshold value to limit ascii output
inputs.name: Cross Correlation Coefficient threshold

inputs.description: Write the results to an ascii file for voxels with cross correlation coefficients larger than CCT
inputs.name: Output ASCII file

inputs.description: Write the results and time series to an ascii file for voxels with cross correlation coefficients larger than CCT
inputs.name: Output ASCII file with time series

output-files.description: Primary output results Brick for Delay
output-files.name: Output Brick

output-files.description: Log file containing parameter settings and warnings
output-files.name: Output ASCII log file

output-files.description: Output ASCII file with time series
output-files.name: Output ASCII file with time series
